data.text: @MJMaynardSNV Glad you are sharing your experience, MJ. And so sry you were ill 🦋 -- I am grateful to everyone who facilitated vaccination availability.

@MJMaynardSNV I was diagnosed in April 2020, but I knew I was sick before the diagnosis. It was a long 3 weeks of illness and it took me a long time before I felt better. My hospital that I work at, offered me the vaccine back in late December and I took it. I'm grateful as well.
@Micah_Owings We'll have to agree to disagree. Was advised to get the vaccine. And I definitely value science over opinions.
